website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung NX2000 mirrorless camera has a huge touch-screen display and great Wi-Fi support, but it's a little slow to focus.
pros: Good performance at higher ISO settings
cons: Display is hard to see in very bright light

customer_reviews.title: My humble review
customer_reviews.text: I think is a great camera for the price i'm a beginner photographer i enjoy making videos so only thing i wish this camera had was an external microphone but there's options out-there such as the Samsung NX MIC haven't tried it. In the future I will probably upgrade to a Samsung DSLR if they have those.. im really amazed by all the features really really convenient camera for the average user. I added a few images so you guys could see the quality
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Good buy User friendly
customer_reviews.text: Very user friendly. I am by no means a pro but I do enjoy taking photos as often as possible. This Camera has everything I need and then some. I own a Samsung phone so to be able to use the Smart WiFi to share some photos that I have taken is really great. I am still learning how to use all the features on it but so far I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: vquad

customer_reviews.title: wifi, touchscreen, value, a real winner
customer_reviews.text: Samsung is the king of the touchscreen and this camera maintains the reputation with a 3.7 inch best in class touchscreen. Also outstanding is the wifi, second to none. the included flash is decent, the camera has a hotshoe for other accessories, and offers interchangeable lenses. the low light performance and focusing could improve, but other than that this camera is easy to use, a great value, and feels good in the hands. picture quality is excellent, combined with the fully automatic or fully manual controls, this is an appropriate camera for any and all skill levels. I highly recommend, especially at this reduced price.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Cusse

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: It's a good starter mirrorless camera that's easy on the wallet. What's going to add up is the cost of lenses. I use the lenses that it came with, it's great for al kind of photos. I have been using this as my standard camera since 2014. I did get an extra batter for the camera.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: It has very good new features as far as technology goes but It ...
customer_reviews.text: It has very good new features as far as technology goes but It can't take simple shots without something going wrong .Good size camera for travel but I really would like to return this product because it won't take pictures without mess. I tried everything I could but there is something terribly wrong with lens. Battery also goes completely dead weather you use the camera or not. I had it over 2 years and I used it 3 times. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: YanaCoy

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. I bought this to replace my DSLR (because it was so large and heavy) and it has not disappointed. I am not a professional, so I can't go into detail, but the point and shoot functions work great for me. Battery life is good and I love the wifi function to take pictures and share pictures. I also love that it charges with a standard android cord. I had some trouble finding a carrying strap for this (the one that came with it didn't stay on).
customer_reviews.author: Elisalouk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera! When I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera! When I bought it, and when I'm writing this review (and probably now too), this was the cheapest APS-C sensor with interchangeable lens camera available in the market. The image quality is nearly equal to that of a less-than-$500 DSLR camera. Sensors, and then lenses are more important for image quality than megapixels of a camera alone, and an APS-C sensor makes this camera just as good as a $500 priced DSLR. However, if you are a serious photographer you may consider buying a DSLR as they are made for the serious photography route.
customer_reviews.author: Nivethan

customer_reviews.title: I'm loving this camera!
customer_reviews.text: It's an awesome camera for the price. Size and weight is perfect: big and heavy enough to make you feel confident and small and light enough to make you feel confortable taking it everywhere. It takes awesome pictures, has a lot of automatic settings, programs, etc, but it is also great on manual. The mobile features are an awesome plus, using your phone as viewfinder or being able to easily send the pictures to your phone are really helpful features. The only small problem was that the system got frozen on a specific option, but a firmware upgrade fixed it completely.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago

customer_reviews.title: great picture in daylight, compact.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I got this for $200 during the promotional sale!!! Best mirrorless camera for the price ever!!! It takes great pictures during daylight, however, at nightlight, it takes longer to get focus. I like the in-camera edit function, pretty cool. For $200, it will beat any other camera in its class. Cons: only a few hard buttons, I would love to have a few additional hard button, that'd make it easier to operate.
customer_reviews.author: WinWin

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd one, Great product, easy to use. Anybody can take great pic with this one. Some reviews say it don't take good pic, and to hared to use, they are wrong. I been an Cannon Fan for years and been doing for over 25 years. I just got tried of packing the Canon 60D around. This beets the Cannon in clear pic. And I use in the RAW, mode no problem. I would buy this again over a Canon.
customer_reviews.author: Camman

customer_reviews.title: I love the portability and weight of this
customer_reviews.text: I love the portability and weight of this. I take this camera everywhere (also have Canon 5DM2 which now stays home all of the time). I have the 50-100mm lens, the 200 mm lens and the 16 mm lens, but wish there were more lens options. excellent image quality and super easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon-aholic

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't have asked for more.
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! The auto-backup to your phone, and the ability to take pictures remotely with your phone are some of the best features out there. Takes very crisp photos, and taking panoramas is a BREEZE! I've taken gorgeous panoramas without using a tripod, just my hands! Big fan so far...
customer_reviews.author: Vioxx

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful camera
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good about this camera! It is perfect for my family. I was looking for something that wasn't huge but not something microscopic either. This Samsung has so many features that enhance the picture as it is taken. I found the instructions easy to follow and the camera itself is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: A camera that can make a beginner feel like a pro!
customer_reviews.text: I am by far not a professional photographer, but this camera sure does make me feel like one. It has given me some excellent pictures straight out of the box, without even messing with any settings. I want to learn more about photography and this seems like an excellent learning tool that really fit my budget. I have only ever owned point and shoot cameras so this little beauty is a real treat for me. You won't be disappointed in this camera if you choose it. The pictures are crystal clear. I love it so much I have ordered the 50-200mm lens and plan on ordering more as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Totem74

customer_reviews.title: Social Media Master
customer_reviews.text: This is an AMAZING camera. The mirror-less cameras are a nice size compromise between point and shoot cameras and DSLRs. The picture quality is top notch and there are tons of features. My favorite feature is the WiFi connectivity. I have transitioned between an iPhone 4s and Samsung Galaxy S5 while I've had this camera, and the interface with the iPhone is good, but definitely better with the Samsung. With this camera and a smartphone, I was able to take pictures at a wedding make some quick edits and upload pictures to Facebook during the reception. Images were head and shoulders better than anything posted from anyone's cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Pat the Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Smart, like my girlfriend
customer_reviews.text: This camera is gorgeous, I get compliments on it every time a person see it. I hesitate a bit because the price was too low compared to other similar ones, but I'm more than impressed and satisfied with the quality of the pictures, and all the great functionalities included.
customer_reviews.author: Hiram Farrera

customer_reviews.title: Alright Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera sometimes wont take pictures in low light situations but besides that its alright.
customer_reviews.author: Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Best camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: Best camera I've owned so far. Ive tried the other big brands, but this one is best. Easy touchscreen menus and buttons. I would say its even better than the NX3000, but the 3000 has a slightly longer battery life. You won't be disappointed with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is great and easy to use. I was first hesitant about getting a camera since it seems like you can do everything with your phone now days, but it was very worth to buy. I am not a photographer, I just take a pictures here and there. It's easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera For the Price
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, especially for the price. I did my friend's senior pictures with it and people thought they were professionally done, but the photos were taken on a sunny day and I had to do a great amount of color fixing on my computer afterwards. The camera came with Adobe Photoshop Lightroom, which made it easy to do all that editing.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome, cool
customer_reviews.text: Super awesome, cool, love it! Great quality pictures, videos. The best feature is the charging cord! We own mostly Samsung products and its so awesome being able to connect them all together. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Yakko

customer_reviews.title: This camera is so great. It takes lovely photos on auto and has ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera is so great. It takes lovely photos on auto and has many settings to try as well. It can connect to a phone app and send photos even without internet around. We have been very very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: cat49

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera that takes really good pictures for the size. I like that you can use it as a manual focus camera, or just click auto, and point and shoot. The action shot setting is great for catching action. I also like that you can wirelessly send photos to your camera or email them. I think my favorite thing about this camera, is the best face setting. The only thing I wish is that it had a built in flash. But the low light setting is so good, it's not a bid deal.
customer_reviews.author: AK Beachgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great photography
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great for a non photographer. It's easy and fun to use. So much to play with. Still figuring it out.. small enough to travel with and the detachable/changeable lenses give you lots of options.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use and the pictures are better than a ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had it a little over a month. It is easy to use and the pictures are better than a Sony I've been using for over ten years. I certainly reccomend it to one and all.
customer_reviews.author: No Moore

customer_reviews.title: i cant get good photos when the sun is not visible
customer_reviews.text: im having problem with it. i cant get good photos when the sun is not visible
customer_reviews.author: Myra C.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I bought it to start taking photography lessons and the quality of the pictures it takes is awesome. And the price is best part of it.
customer_reviews.author: Sanabria

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camara takes great pictures even with the stock zoom ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camara takes great pictures even with the stock zoom it has ..intake it everywhere I got its very light weight camara comes with a neck strap for easy sport ...has many different levels of picture quality does exactly what it describes ...pluz it was super quick delivery ..I was amazed by the quickness it got to me ..I would recommend this camara to all the first time buyers it's a great starters camara !!!
customer_reviews.author: yacsely lopez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera, great wireless features.  You can even e-mail pics straight from the camera!
customer_reviews.text: Super nice and very smart camera. Lots of available accessories including an excellent zoom lens and accepts standard filters. Very happy with this purchase, especially for under $300.
customer_reviews.author: Terryll Rainey

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved his gift
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate, share upload, download and interact with other devices. Small but not too small and lens options are good.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Lozano

customer_reviews.title: jy559@cairn.edu
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera, and I like the photo. It has everything I need for dslr camera. Trusted reviews said that photo color is not acceptable, but i think he was wrong and I believe that he does not know how to use the camera. Overall, I like the camera
customer_reviews.author: jung yoon

customer_reviews.title: Nice small camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice small camera, not just a point and shoot, really takes great pics if you know your Low light can use some improvement , but overall is pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Karl S Washington

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing purchase! Fast shipping and the camera was in perfect condition, in love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: 2 snaps & a smile
customer_reviews.text: It was a Birthday gift for my son. HE LOVES IT!! BEAUTIFUL CLEAR PICS! It's only been a few days since he received it but so far so good. I like that it came with a strap. My only complaint at this time is that it should've included a SD card like the phones do. That's the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars. It makes no sense not to include it. Quick standard delivery. It only took 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for my 7 pounds of  NIKON 7 photo equipment
customer_reviews.text: Excellent photos, very easy to use. Very flexible. I am amazed how good Samsung cameras are. I tried all the 3/4 cameras from Nikon, Sony, Panasonic, Olympus and Cannon and came convinced that for about the same price: from $500 to $1000 Samsung is superior. I could not believe the outcome since I have been regularly using Nikon, Olympus, Panasonic and Cannon cameras of different types from DSRL to compacts including middle range 36x to 60x zoom. Very expensive lenses in NIKON. I did not miss any of them. Great job SAMSUNG
customer_reviews.author: Elias Caro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my camera it takes great pictures and I always get compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: My favorite point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: My favorite point and shoot! The settings are pretty good! And you can send your photos over wifi to your phone or email!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Velasco

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera, with lots of features
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera, with lots of features. The picture quality is good but you need to learn a little bit about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kushwaha

customer_reviews.title: I really like that you have an app that can control the ...
customer_reviews.text: clear pictures and lots of options. I really like that you have an app that can control the camera wireless.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: It takes excellent daylight and low light pictures
customer_reviews.text: We saved a lot of money buying this camera on Amazon. It takes excellent daylight and low light pictures. At night the pictures didn't come out very well, but I think a tripod and a flash would improve that.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Zakel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera
customer_reviews.text: I just love love love this camera and lenses. Very light weight. Great features. Easy to learn how to use. Especially love the ability to directly share my photos from the camera to email, etc. Recommended to another family member who has purchased one also.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: simple and useful
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Camera, not a DSLR, but beautiful picks and light weight, pleasure to shoot with!
customer_reviews.author: Nachobizniz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: OMG there are no words for how much I LOVE this camera!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lora K

customer_reviews.title: Worked Beautifully!...For a Week.
customer_reviews.text: When I received this camera in the mail, I was absolutely in love! The picture quality was excellent, it had a fast shutter speed, and had all the modes and functions I could have ever wanted. Then the problems began. Before I had the chance to loan this camera to my mother for her trip to San Francisco, the camera started to not take photos or even turn on. I had it for a grand total of one week, and the camera stopped working. I returned it after three days of not being able to use it. Don't waste your time. Invest in a better camera.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Perry

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the quality of the pic's
customer_reviews.text: This camera is more than I expected in this price range. Very pleased with the quality of the pic's. Sent a pic to my son in Europe directly from the camera vie the built in WiFi and he got it. No more hassle with removing the SD card. Touch screen is very clear and responsive, I highly recommend this camera. I bought an adapter for my FD Canon lenses, which I have not used yet. I am looking forward to being able to use these again.
customer_reviews.author: P. MAC

customer_reviews.title: omg I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: omg I love this camera. It takes GREAT pictures and it also came with a light room photoshop installation and I use that for all the photos I take on my Samsung and my cannon! I take this camera everywhere with me to take pictures and videos!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera! Awesome Images!
customer_reviews.text: It's much lighter than my older cameras, so I take it with me more frequently. It also connects shares directly with my phone, so I can immediatley edit images on my phone before I post them.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Great camera! Takes excellent photos
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! Takes excellent photos. The photographer for our wedding said they were going to buy one for a back up

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, Pics are awesome camera is user friendly still learning all that it can do....

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just a great camera, very happy with the standard lens that came with it.

customer_reviews.title: Im in love.
customer_reviews.text: The pictures that come out of this camera is pure magic. It captures EVERYTHING. Im in love.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this camera software is hard to figure out but the camera is easy

customer_reviews.title: Nice entry level camera
customer_reviews.text: Chose this camera because i wanted a small easily carried camera with the capability to change the lenses. The camera takes high quality photos with very little delay. Have not received the 50-200mm lens yet,
customer_reviews.author: HJR

customer_reviews.title: ... make YouTube videos and I must say it has amazing video quality but I would prefer to the nx3000 ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this camera to make YouTube videos and I must say it has amazing video quality but I would prefer to the nx3000 because of the flip screen mirror view. I think it will be more convenient for those who like to make videos :)
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use and Wi-Fi capability. Have recommended to friends and family.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a camera for vacation to Florida and this one filled the bill. Easy to use and every picture I took turned out great. Impressive for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S. Hembree

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use and great quality camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use and great quality camera for the price. I'm a Samsung fan, easily linked to my other mobile devices with hiccups. Came as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: NX2000 is a mix of a point-and-shoot and a semi-professional camera. It has a good battery life which allows you to spend a day shooting great pictures. It gives us a lot of possibilities without asking for a lot of specific knowledge.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good camera
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good camera. Get a second battery though, because you won't make it through a sporting event. I wasn't constantly taking pictures and it didn't make it through the awards session of my daughter's gymnastics meet.
customer_reviews.author: Monica L McKeithen

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. First "nice" camera and I love how ...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. First "nice" camera and I love how easy it is to use and the high megapixel quality. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Good camera to teach you about light controls and an advance point and shoot camera.
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. There is some lag in focusing and saving the pictures at rich tone mode, but if you have patience it's worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Ankur Sharma

customer_reviews.title: This was a really small camera. also if you ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a really small camera. also if you are coming from an existing system make sure your accessories are compatible. I returned it because there are really no accessories (speedlites) I wound up getting a Canon T5i, lots of third party accessories.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONYTWASHINGTON

customer_reviews.title: Easy control, especially for the touch screen
customer_reviews.text: Got it for 200 bucks. Decent image quality. Easy control, especially for the touch screen. Gotta be a nice gift for mom. Putting on (and unlock!) the lens is a little bit annoying, but that should not be a problem.

customer_reviews.text: I like the price and the color and it is exactly what I needed, I would easily recommend it to a friend or relative.

customer_reviews.title: Best performance in the smallest possible package
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a DSLR camera. I am perfectly happy with the performance so far, the images are crisp as you would expect from a DSLR.This is a great camera, whether you like to use the easy. This camera is simple to use and takes fantastic pictures. I am very happy with it. I personally really wanted a nice camera that was fast to get those kid-shots. It re-loads quickly and takes the shot pretty immediately, both of which things were the most important to me. It also takes extremely sharp pictures in good light, doing the blurry background thing that is really cool, too. I would recommend this camera to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Byung

customer_reviews.title: great camera, great pictures

But what so good is it very compact and I can take it with me always and never miss a shot or wish I had brought my camera with me. Video very good, it's like having my Nikon DSLR with me but very compact.

customer_reviews.author: busymomma

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for money
customer_reviews.text: - pros: excellent image quality, the wifi feature works very well, very good value for money, very compact and light. - Cons: an adjustable screen would have been nice as well as a built in view finder, the battery life is bad, a couple more batteries and an external charger are a must.
customer_reviews.author: juan felipe

customer_reviews.title: This little camera is big on features
customer_reviews.text: I have not work with the camera extensively but it appears to be just what I was looking for. Little camera big performance.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Locke

customer_reviews.title: YouTube will show how easy camera works. Then spen a little time with it.
customer_reviews.text: GREAT camera, took a day of use to get to know well it works. Very easy to operate, lots of options.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy K. Krueger

customer_reviews.title: gift for my wife
customer_reviews.text: very good pics it was a gift for my wife and she uses it all the time. the only down fall is you have to buy a different lens to be able to zoom but the one that came with the camera works fine you can zoom way in on the pic after you have taken it. the over all of this camera is great.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what to think so far, you ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what to think so far, you promoted a white lens for the 50-200 but yet I got a black one...
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Weiand

customer_reviews.title: Having issues with the camera right off the bat. ...
customer_reviews.text: Having issues with the camera right off the bat. Every time I snap a photo I am getting a processing screen. After doing some trouble shooting the reason was the memory card. I purchased a new memory card, still could not take a picture. The camera is going ot be getting services by samsung tomorrow. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Zaro

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed with the camera, no zoom bottom away, and is not turned off automatically, but the pictures are good... I'm sad with the purchase but is cute.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Box is not sealed
customer_reviews.text: Shipping is Fast. But when i opened the Box the Main box of the Camera is not sealed the sticker is not out. But the Camera is good. Still need to get used to it i Hope this is not a Used camera. :( But i love the camera it self.
customer_reviews.author: Llyn R.

customer_reviews.title: Total disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera because it was #2 top best selling camera in its category. Missing a view finder is a huge design flaw. The battery runs out after taking 120-130 shots. The picture quality (not resolution) is worse than our iPhone 5S.
customer_reviews.author: KSC

product_meta.title: Samsung NX2000 20.3MP CMOS Smart WiFi Mirrorless Digital Camera with 20-50mm Lens and 3.7" Touch Screen LCD (Black) (OLD MODEL)
product_meta.description:
With the Samsung SMART CAMERA NX2000 you’re telling stories, not just taking pictures. Its ultra-sensitive 20.3MP APS-C CMOS Sensor allows you to create images full of detail with colors that fire up the imagination. The spacious 3.7” (93.8mm) WVGA touch screen gives you plenty of room to hone your craftsmanship, and variety of Smart Modes and manual controls make it ideal for photography enthusiasts like you.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Take brilliant pictures and videos and share them easily with family and friends using the Samsung NX2000 Smart Camera. This camera features a 20.3-megapixel sensor along with a 3.7-inch touchscreen display for clearly viewing and editing your photos. Wi-Fi capabilities allow you to upload videos to Facebook or YouTube or stream them to other devices. Included with the camera is a 20-50mm lens.

The 3.7-inch touchscreen display makes navigation intuitive and easy. View larger.

An advanced 20.3-megapixel sensor shoots well in low-light conditions. View larger.

20.3-MEGAPIXEL SENSOR FOR CRISP, DETAILED PHOTOS
An advanced 20.3-megapixel APS-C CMOS sensor is at the heart of the Samsung NX2000, capturing lifelike colors and beautiful images with the highest resolution in its class. The camera has an ISO range from 100 to 25,600, so you'll be able take great photos in different lighting situations. Measuring 23.5 by 15.6 millimeters, the sensor collects a large amount of light, making the camera well suited for out-focusing photography and for shooting noise-free images in low-light conditions. 

INTUITIVE TOUCHSCREEN TO REVIEW AND EDIT PHOTOS
To help you clearly see and edit your photographs, the NX2000 is equipped with a 3.7-inch WVGA touchscreen display. There are no physical menu buttons cluttering the back of the camera--all of the menu options are built into the display. The touchscreen shows a full spectrum of colors, so what you see on the screen matches your subject. 

Built-in WiFi means you can share your photos without the hassle of cables or removing memory cards. View larger.

WI-FI CONNECTIVITY FOR EASY SHARING
Thanks to built-in Wi-Fi, transferring your images and sharing them no longer requires memory cards or cables. You won't have to worry about running out of space, either. With the dedicated Direct Link hot key, you can quickly connect to Wi-Fi networks. Once connected, you can save photos and videos directly to a computer or cloud service as you shoot. Print photos wirelessly or share them with your friends instantly by uploading them to Facebook or YouTube. 

CONNECT TO YOUR SMARTPHONE FOR MORE FEATURES
The NX2000 features Near Field Communication (NFC) technology and works with Samsung's Smart Camera App (for Android), so you can instantly pair your camera with your smartphone and take advantage of features such as AutoShare and Remote ViewFinder. 

Pair your camera with your smartphone to take advantage of features like Remote ViewFinder. View larger.

When AutoShare is activated, all the pictures you take on your camera are automatically sent to your smartphone. Remote ViewFinder turns your phone into a viewfinder and lets you preview images, adjust camera settings, frame the scene, and tag the shot location from up to 30 feet away. When you need to take a group shot with yourself in it, Remote ViewFinder makes it easy. 

SAMSUNG LINK TO CONNECT WITH OTHER DEVICES
Thanks to Samsung Link, you can connect this camera wirelessly with other nearby Samsung Link-enabled devices and share photos and videos or upload them to your web storage service. 

CLOUD SERVICE BACKUP
Never worry about losing your photos, even if your camera is lost or stolen. If your camera is connected to Wi-Fi, the NX2000 will automatically copy the images you take to a cloud service such as Microsoft SkyDrive. This feature not only automatically backs up all your photos, but it also lets you free space on your memory card by deleting shots without fear you'll lose them. 

CONTINUOUS SHOOTING FOR FAST-MOVING SUBJECTS
Using the NX2000 Smart Camera, you can shoot continuously at 8 frames per second (FPS) and take brilliant, clear stills of fast-moving action--say, a sports game or a performance. This helps you capture those fleeting special moments before the subject moves out of the frame. 

Different shooting modes let you take the ideal shot every time. View larger.

FULL HD VIDEO RECORDING
The NX2000 also has 1080p Full HD movie recording capabilities. Use the bundled lenses for a cinematic experience, or choose from a wide range of lenses (sold separately) to get the scene you want. The CMOS sensor gives you precise autofocus even as you're shooting. 

3D PHOTOS AND VIDEOS
The Samsung NX2000 lets you take your photos and videos to a new dimension with support for true 3D. When you combine the camera with a 3D lens (sold separately), you get true 3D photos and videos (3D TV system required to view in 3D). 

SMART MODE FOR SPECIAL EFFECTS
Tap the smart mode button to take advantage of numerous special shoot modes. Action Freeze mode lets you capture a high-speed scene, such as in sports, while Fireworks mode is perfect for shooting pyrotechnic displays. Use Light Trace mode to capture trails of light at night on a busy intersection full of red taillights. 

A full copy of Adobe Photoshop Lightroom 4 is included for photo management and post-processing.

INCLUDES ADOBE PHOTOSHOP LIGHTROOM 4 SOFTWARE
The Samsung NX2000 includes a DVD-ROM with a full copy of Adobe Photoshop Lightroom 4 so you can manage and post-process your images with the same software that professionals use. With Lightroom, you can recover highlights and shadow details, make precise adjustments to the image, apply noise reduction, create photo books, and easily share your photos on social networks or in web galleries, slideshows, prints, and more. 

INCLUDES 20-50MM LENS
The Samsung NX2000 Smart Camera is bundled with a 20-50mm lens, which provides ideal range for all-around use. The lens' wide zoom range means you can use it for everything from portraits to landscapes, and its small form factor means you can take it with you everywhere you go 

PRODUCT DIMENSIONS AND WEIGHT
The NX2000 measures 2.5 by 4.7 by 1.4 inches (H x W x D) and weighs 0.5 pound. 

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Samsung NX2000 Smart Camera, 20-50mm lens, SEF-8A flash, BP1130 battery, Micro USB cable, USB wall charger, body cap, camera strap, and Adobe Lightroom v4 DVD software. 

NX2000
(BUNDLED WITH 20-50MM LENS)
BLACK
AT A GLANCE:
 * 20.3-megapixel sensor for crisp, vibrant photos
 * Fully functional 3.7-inch touchscreen display
 * Wi-Fi-enabled for uploading photos/videos to social networks and connecting to your smartphone
 * 1080p full HD video recording
 * Includes full version of Adobe Lightroom 4 for advanced editing
 * 20-50mm lens included

The bright and large 3.7-inch touchscreen gives you a great view of the action. View larger.
feature_bullets: SMART features - Social Media Upload, E-mail, Direct Link, Mobile Link, PC Auto-backup, Remote Viewfinder, All share, Cloud Service
